subject: Economy
question_en: Which of the following is the 2020-21 India Economic Survey report?
question_hi: वर्ष 2020-21 के इंडिया की ओरिजनिक सरवर्द्धम प्रकाशन का कौन सा पुस्तकालय में उपलब्ध है।
C_en: Indian Economy: Growth and Development in a Global Context
explanation_en: The correct answer is D as it is the Economic Survey of India for the financial year 2017-18.
